description: Link source PE modules in place of installed modules in both the basemodulepath and enterprise modulepath. Modules must be present in the meep_tools::nfs_mount dir. Copies originals to /root/_meep_tools_backups. Assumes puppet-enterprise-modules.

modules.description: List of PE modules to link in.

link.description: Whether to link module in basemodulepath, enterprise modulepath, or both (default).

branch.description: Branch of PE to link local source modules from.

src_dir.description: Root source directory to link from.
